title: Natural
author: Imagine Dragons
lyrics:
[00:10.25] Will you hold the line
[00:12.32] When every one of them has given up and given in? Tell me
[00:15.16] In this house of mine
[00:16.91] Nothing ever comes without a consequence or cost, tell me
[00:19.99] Will the stars align?
[00:21.95] Will heaven step in? Will it save us from our sin, will it?
[00:24.78] 'Cause this house of mine stands strong
[00:27.89] That's the price you pay
[00:31.35] Leave behind your heart and cast away
[00:36.24] Just another product of today
[00:41.04] Rather be the hunter than the prey
[00:45.74] And you're standing on the edge face up
[00:47.74] 'Cause you're a natural
[00:49.78] A beating heart of stone
[00:52.24] You gotta be so cold
[00:54.61] To make it in this world
[00:57.07] Yeah, you're a natural
[00:59.32] Living your life cutthroat
[01:01.72] You gotta be so cold
[01:04.25] Yeah, you're a natural
[01:07.66] Will somebody
[01:09.77] Let me see the light within the dark trees shadowing?
[01:12.69] What's happening?
[01:14.58] Looking through the glass find the wrong within the past knowing
[01:17.52] Oh, we are the youth
[01:19.33] Cut until it bleeds inside a world without the peace, face it
[01:22.28] A bit of the truth, the truth
[01:25.58] That's the price you pay
[01:29.00] Leave behind your heart and cast away
[01:33.80] Just another product of today
[01:38.66] Rather be the hunter than the prey
[01:43.23] And you're standing on the edge face up
[01:45.26] 'Cause you're a natural
[01:47.42] A beating heart of stone
[01:49.85] You gotta be so cold
[01:52.25] To make it in this world
[01:54.68] Yeah, you're a natural
[01:56.97] Living your life cutthroat
[01:59.46] You gotta be so cold
[02:01.97] Yeah, you're a natural
[02:06.06] Deep inside me, I'm fading to black, I'm fading
[02:10.92] Took an oath by the blood on my hand, won't break it
[02:15.72] I can taste it, the end is upon us, I swear
[02:20.46] Gonna make it
[02:22.74] I'm gonna make it
[02:27.08] Natural
[02:28.65] A beating heart of stone
[02:31.09] You gotta be so cold
[02:33.33] To make it in this world
[02:35.88] Yeah, you're a natural
[02:38.13] Living your life cutthroat
[02:40.68] You gotta be so cold
[02:43.05] Yeah, you're a natural
[02:47.37] 
[02:53.73] Natural
[02:57.61] 
[03:02.47] Yeah, you're a natural
[03:04.60]
